body: Can we please keep the name `FusedKernel` for this? This one is really confusing, because `*Function` is usually a subclass of `autograd::Function` in our codebase, and it really is a "fused function" and not a "fusion function"
body_html: Can we please keep the name FusedKernel for this? This one is really confusing, because *Function is usually a subclass of autograd::Function in our codebase, and it really is a "fused function" and not a "fusion function"
